data.title: Which episode of South Park offended the voice of Chef Issac Hayes?
data.meta_description:
In Season 9 episode 12 (Trapped in the Closet), they make fun of
scientology. Isaac Hayes, being a scientologist, asked them to pull
the episode before it aired. Matt and Trey, the creators/writers of
South Park, obviously didn't pull it. As a result, Mr. Hayes
decided to quit the show. Later on, right before season 10 began,
there were some words exchanged, via the press. Something was said
about Matt and Trey being bigots by Mr. Hayes. As a result of that
being said, the creators of South Park decided to do another show
poking fun at scientology (season 10 episode 1, The Return of
Chef!) and also killing off the character Chef.
data.text:
In Season 9 episode 12 (Trapped in the Closet), they make fun of scientology. Isaac Hayes, being a scientologist, asked them to pull the episode before it aired. Matt and Trey, the creators/writers of South Park, obviously didn't pull it. As a result, Mr. Hayes decided to quit the show. Later on, right before season 10 began, there were some words exchanged, via the press. Something was said about Matt and Trey being bigots by Mr. Hayes. As a result of that being said, the creators of South Park decided to do another show poking fun at scientology (season 10 episode 1, The Return of Chef!) and also killing off the character Chef.

Does chef in south park come back after he dies?

because he died a few years ago. :[ But before Isaac Hayes died, South Park aired an episode about scientology that really pissed him off and he quit/ He was a scientologist and found that episode offensive. In the next episode they make Chef out to be a child molester and kill him quite spectacularly!

Why did chef quit south park?

the voice actor Isaac Hayes is a Scientologist and they made fun of his religion and he said they went too far getting all offended and left. He died a few years later so he'll never be back unfortunately.
